title: Precarious
description:
Ray Christian, Jane Steckbeck, and Mike Sharp share about a bathroom disaster in Korea, a workshop that brought sexual healing, and a mother and son who agreed to disagree about Mormonism.

Support RISK! on Patreon at Patreon.com/RISK

author: Kevin@RISK-show.com (Princess Nauwisa, Jane Steckbeck, Ivan & Alyosha, Mike Sharp, Kevin Allison, Tom Petty and the Heartbreakers, Jeff Barr, Orgone, Ray Christian)
